name: Cubey Billy's Adventures: Helping Kid
description:
This game made for Extra Credits Game Jam #6

The little boy was walking across the road not knowing what was going to happento himself. He saw hundreds of spiked blocks coming towards him at the last moment. 

Billy came to the aid of kid because kid could not move out of fear. Stuck in the hundreds of spiked blocks with the kid, Billy had a great idea. 

He would play basketball because he knew no other sport than basketball. 

And this game was inspired by Billy's heroic actions.
